definitions.definition: Severe overheating of the core of a nuclear reactor resulting in the core melting and potentially in radiation escaping.
A situation being likened to a nuclear meltdown; a crisis .
An autistic response to stress or sensory overload , in which the person is overwhelmed by intense, seemingly disproportionate emotions , behaving erratically and becoming unable to mask .

main_definition: Severe overheating of the core of a nuclear reactor resulting in the core melting and potentially in radiation escaping.
secondary_definitions: A situation being likened to a nuclear meltdown; a crisis .
( informal ) A tantrum or emotional outburst .

( psychology ) An autistic response to stress or sensory overload , in which the person is overwhelmed by intense, seemingly disproportionate emotions , behaving erratically and becoming unable to mask .
